medical_history.chief_complaint: Yellowish papules on the lateral aspect of the neck.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The yellowish papules have been present for approximately 50 years, gradually coalescing into larger plaques with extreme skin laxity and no elastic rebound, expanding symmetrically to axillae, chest, abdomen, and inguinal region over many years.
medical_history.family_history: Both her grandfather and mother had similar skin manifestations.
